= Controller Sample =

{{{

<?php

class welcome_controller extends rpd {

  function index()
  {
    $vars = array('varname'=>'value');
    echo $this->view('welcome',$vars);
  }
  
  function test()
  {
    echo 'test';
  }

}


}}}


http://website/welcome

will output the content of the view 'welcome', in the welcome view $varname will be filled by 'value'


http://website/welcome/test

will output 'test'
